Title: All Rise
Writer: Walter Dean Myers (novel), Janece Shaffer, Colen C. Wiley
Actors: Jharrel Jerome, Jennifer Ehle, John David Washington, Jeffrey Wright
Plot: "Monster" is what the prosecutor calls 17 year old honors student Steve Harmon. He is being charged with felony murder. But is Steve really a monster? Adapted from the best-selling novel of the same name by Walter Dean Myers.
